definition: tritium/3H/radioactive isotope of hydrogen having 2 neutrons in its nucleus, so atomic weight 3

sentences.english: It is a naturally occurring radioactive form of hydrogen, sometimes known as heavy hydrogen.
sentences.chinese: 氚是氫的放射性形式，有時被稱作超重氫。

sentences.english: A deuterium atom is a hydrogen with an extra neutron in its nucleus.
sentences.chinese: 重氫是原子核中多一箇中子的氫。

sentences.english: Deuterium-based fusion reactors enter widespread use on Earth.
sentences.chinese: 基於重氫的聚變反應堆在地球上被廣泛使用。
